channel.title: Homes on Greydon Gilmore
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Greydon Gilmore

item.description: Biography Greydon Gilmore is a current Ph.D. Candidate in Biomedical Engineering in the lab of Dr. Mandar Jog and Dr. Rajni Patel. His research interests include deep brain stimulation and localization techniques for electrodes post-operation. He has several industry partnered grants focused on improving precision and outcome of deep brain stimulation surgery for movement disorders.

item.title: Grants

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am a teaching instructor for the following courses at Western University: PHYSIOL2130: Human Physiology ENGSCI9010: IP for Engineers
